00006         Regex::Regex(const std::string& regex_mask) {
00007                 if(regcomp(&m_regex, regex_mask.c_str(), REG_EXTENDED))
00008                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::Exception, "An error occurred at creation regexp for mask. Invalid value of regular expression '" << regex_mask << "'.");

00012                 regfree(&m_regex);

00015         bool Regex::match(const std::string& value) {
00016                 return !regexec(&m_regex, value.c_str(), 0, 0, 0);
00017         }
